titleStmt.title: Letters of Appeal - Request for Reply
titleStmt.author: S. Boston

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

objectDesc.p: Handwritten letter from S. Boston to Eartha M. M. White on 1/13/1930 requesting a response from White.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.head:
Jacksonville FlaFlorida
Feb, 13, 1930February thirteenth, nineteen thirty
Mrs E. M. White.
body.p:
Dear. Just a few
lines to let you hear from me
a stranglestranger to you, but not to
god, is my belivebelief. Mrs White w
hen my way I wish to
Have a talk please with you
disable to come to you. Will
you please let me Herehear
from you. Oblige
Spucile
Boston
1506 Haines ave.Avenue
